entry.title: Twitter is arguably already the least wrong source of truth on the Internet, but we obviously still have a long way to go. Enabling @CommunityNotes to...
entry.summary: Twitter is arguably already the least wrong source of truth on the Internet, but we obviously still have a long way to go. Enabling @CommunityNotes to operate at very large scale and providing maximum transparency about how Twitter works are fundamental to building trust.
